stories.title: Support for the Ukrainian orienteering community by IOF orienteering

stories.text:
Dorae is seeking a Director of Engineering to join our award-winning team serving the global trade space (www.dorae.com).

The Director of Engineering will be a senior member of the team, with broad responsibilities spanning the engineering function and significant advancement potential.

Dorae has a distributed team located in the US, UK and Portugal. The role can be remote or office-based. Competitive compensation.

Skillset / Experience:

- Strong experience in React, C# and PostgreSQL required - Familiarity with distributed ledger principles - Familiarity with AWS infrastructure - Very strong organizational and communication skills – able to effectively articulate and break down complex concepts and tasks - Self-motivated and able to work well in a fast-growing environment - University degree in math, engineering, computer science or natural sciences - 8+ years experience

CONTACT: careers@dorae.com
